  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Content Creator",
  "description": "Softnation Homes Limited&nbsp;is a forward-thinking real estate development, marketing, and consultancy firm, dedicated to delivering luxury land and home solutions that fuse elegance, exclusivity, and strategic value. We exist to raise the bar in property living, optimizing spaces for discerning cosmopolitans who want more than just shelter, they want prestige, comfort, and a sound investment.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Content Creator

Job Location:&nbsp;Ajah, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	We are seeking a creative, confident, and versatile Content Creator who can bring our brand to life through engaging visuals, videos, and storytelling that attract high-value clients and drive sales.
	The ideal candidate must be well-spoken, camera-friendly, and creative, with the ability to conceptualize, film, and deliver premium social media content that aligns with our brand goals. Basic editing and administrative skills are also required.
	You will work closely with the marketing team to generate consistent, high-quality property and lifestyle content that resonates with our target audience.


Key Responsibilities


	Create engaging video and photo content for property listings, social media, and marketing campaigns.
	Present professionally in videos showcasing properties, lifestyle content, and client experiences.
	Brainstorm and develop creative content ideas in line with real estate trends.
	Write captions, scripts, and social media posts to match content themes.
	Assist in managing content calendars and coordinating marketing schedules.
	Conduct live videos, interviews, and on-site walkthroughs for brand engagement.
	Perform basic video and photo editing for social media optimization.
	Support the marketing team with administrative tasks such as client follow-up, scheduling, and reporting.
	Participate in team meetings, strategy sessions, and occasional field campaigns.


Education &amp; Qualifications


	Minimum of OND / HND / B.Sc. in Mass Communication, Marketing, Media Studies, or related field.
	Certifications in Content Creation, Digital Marketing, or Communication are an added advantage.


Experience:


	2&ndash;4 years of proven experience as a content creator, influencer, or social media personality (preferably in the real estate or lifestyle industry).
	Demonstrated ability to produce engaging on-camera content.
	Experience managing social media pages or brand campaigns is required.


Other Requirements:


	Must reside within Ajah, Sangotedo, Abraham Adesanya, or Lekki Axis.
	Must be confident, presentable, and well-spoken.
	Must be creative, consistent, and reliable with strong time management.
	Must be comfortable appearing in videos and representing the brand professionally.
	Must be adaptable and willing to take on other related roles as assigned.
	Immediate availability is a plus.


Required Skills &amp; Competencies:


	Excellent verbal communication and presentation skills.
	Strong camera presence and confidence in speaking on video.
	Creative thinking with strong storytelling and content direction ability.
	Basic knowledge of video and photo editing (CapCut, Canva, InShot, Lightroom, etc.).
	Strong organizational and multitasking abilities.
	Good understanding of social media platforms (Instagram, TikTok, YouTube, and Facebook).
	Administrative and coordination skills are a strong plus.
	Ability to work in a fast-paced, collaborative environment.


Remuneration &amp; Benefits


	Salary: N100,000 - N120,00 / month.
	Competitive monthly salary (based on experience and skill).
	Performance bonuses based on content engagement and lead generation.
	Growth opportunities into brand, media, or operations roles.
	Access to creative support, media resources, and property content materials.
	Exposure to luxury real estate brands and premium clientele.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;emmanueltami7@gmail.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.",
